scripts.test:stage: npx cross-env ENV=stage npm run test
scripts.test:prod: npx cross-env ENV=prod npm run test
scripts.docker:test:stage: docker build -t bookstore-api-tests . && docker run --rm -e ENV=stage bookstore-api-tests npm run test
scripts.docker:test:prod: docker build -t bookstore-api-tests . && docker run --rm -e ENV=prod bookstore-api-tests npm run test
